transferCriteria.name: TransferType
transferCriteria.description: The type of transfer the deed represents (Market, Non-Market, etc.)

transferCriteria.name: TransferDate
transferCriteria.description: The date the transfer or sale was recorded at the county recorder's office

transferCriteria.name: TransferMonth
transferCriteria.description: The month the transfer took place (anniversary date), useful for annual reminders

transferCriteria.name: TransferDocumentType
transferCriteria.description: The type of document recorded (Deeds, Deeds of Trust, Notices of Default, etc.)

transferCriteria.name: TransferDocumentNumber
transferCriteria.description: The unique document number assigned by the recorder's office

transferCriteria.name: TransferAmount
transferCriteria.description: The amount of the transfer or sale recorded at the county recorder's office

transferCriteria.name: WasListed
transferCriteria.description: Whether the property was listed for sale within 180 days prior to the transfer

transferCriteria.name: MostRecentChangeOfOwnership
transferCriteria.description: Whether the transfer was the most recent change of ownership

transferCriteria.name: MultipleParcels
transferCriteria.description: Whether the transfer included multiple parcels

transferCriteria.name: NumberOfParcels
transferCriteria.description: The number of parcels included in the transfer document

transferCriteria.name: BuyerName
transferCriteria.description: The party receiving title or interest in real property (Grantee)

transferCriteria.name: SellerName
transferCriteria.description: The person transferring title to or interest in real property (Grantor)

transferCriteria.name: TitleCompany
transferCriteria.description: The name of the title company that facilitated the transaction

transferCriteria.name: TransferPublishedDate
transferCriteria.description: The date the record was published to PropertyRadar

transferCriteria.name: CashBuyer
transferCriteria.description: Whether the buyer purchased the property without financing

transferCriteria.name: REOResale
transferCriteria.description: Whether the property was sold by a bank after foreclosure

transferCriteria.name: Flip
transferCriteria.description: Whether the property was purchased and resold within a short period of time

transferCriteria.name: PurchaseMonthsSincePrior
transferCriteria.description: The number of months between the most recent change in ownership and the previous one

criteriaTypes.Multiple Values: Accepts an array of multiple values for matching
criteriaTypes.Multiple Range: Accepts a series of arrays with min and max values, e.g. [[100, 200], [300, 400]]
criteriaTypes.Relative Date: Accepts preset date strings like 'Last 30 Days' or specific dates and ranges
